1.content:
Bowser sat in his castle still fuming after the last loss Mario handed to him two days ago as a Magikoopa tried to cheer him up, “It’s alright your Grumpiness you really made that plumber have to work for it this time and it gave your kids a lot of fun and experience!” Bowser gave one look to the servant that made him sweat profusely and nearly choke on his own tongue as the king of Koopas closed his eyes and thought more to himself: sure Magikoopa was right but the children could learn only so much from losing constantly especially watching their dear father being beaten constantly by his greatest enemy...but that was when it hit him! He did use magic in order to create his children the most important things in his life who said magic couldn’t be used again to fix his problems with his enemies? He could do things like possibly make more children from them, more soldiers for his army as reliable ones were hard to come by,...or even a wife. With the possibilities in mind he knew to target Mario first as he spent two days using magic and natural recipes to make a cursed mushroom to be sent to him via mail making it look like it came from Peach to begin with...

The next day Mario went out to check his mail when he noticed a package with the imprint of the Mushroom Kingdom Castle on the side immediately thinking it had to be from Peach excited to see what was inside the plumber quickly pulled it open to discover a black mushroom with red eyes...Mario found it odd but ate it anyways as if Peach made it it would have to be good but instead all he tasted was an extremely burnt mushroom with some gooey sticky liquid inside that he couldn’t get out of his mouth no matter how he struggled little did he know it was making him...

11.content: As Mario stumbled around reentering his home he made his way over to the bathroom as he felt like he was heating up and needed to splash his face with water but his reflection stopped his train of thought as he saw most of his face was now covered in green scales and two horns were protruding through his signature hat.

13.content: Bowser felt that as Mario was such a big pain in his side for so many years that he deserved to be at the bottom of the totem poll of power in his new world order and who was lower in the Koopa army than a normal Goomba? Nothing that was what as Mario started to get sleepy he made his way back inside and fell next to his bed as he started having a bad dream...
13.title: Bowser’s newest Goomba foot soldier

info.brief_description: Bowser feels the need for more soldiers so he makes some out of Mario and friends
info.description:
Bowser fed up with constantly losing and feeling the need for more men and women in his army decides to use his knowledge in magic and technology to change Mario and friends into loyal servants taking part in many different positions in his army.

Rules:
No vore, unbirthing, etc

All characters are of age in the story

Bowser is aiming to transform his enemies he will not target his own army unless they betray him

No fattening, gigantification, shrinking, etc.

Bowser is trying to expand his army so make sure to transform people into creatures known to serve Bowser, Koopas, or a machine typically seen in his army

No toilet humor, diapers, poop stuff, feet fetish, or fart fetish

Sex is allowed but put a warning at the beginning of the chapter

No characters from franchises outside of the Mario franchise

With all this in mind have fun and I look forward to writing with you all!
